content: Hi All, not sure if this is the right place to post so apologies if not. We are looking at introducing FHIR for all new integration work and are hoping to find some suitable training. Are you aware of any FHIR training coming up in 2019 located in Australia and New Zealand? Many thanks Julia
@Brett Esler @Peter Jordan
@Julia Davis please PM me with regards to training requirements in NZ.
@Peter Jordan PM'd you ... many thanks
